DOC.brief_summary: The management functional psychogenic movement disorder ( FNPMD ) challenge neurologist psychiatrist comprehensive multidisciplinary treatment programme worthwhile patient ( Moene et al 2002 ) . Recent functional magnetic resonance image study demonstrate abnormality motor control cortical level , hyperactivity limbic system disturbance connectivity two system lead lack self-agency , ( Voon et al 2010,2011 ) .Two recent study suggest possible therapeutic effect transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) FNPMD ( Dakotakis 2011 , Garcin , 2013 ) . In protocol objective twofold : 1. compare effect 5 consecutive daily session rTMS FNPMD double-blind randomize control study 2. study effect 3 weekly hypnosis session combine rTMS FNPMD
DOC.brief_title: rTMS Effect Functional Psychogenic Movement Disorders Applied Alone Then Combined With Hypnotherapy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Man woman FNPMD least 2 month , diagnose clinical Diagnostic Statistical Manual V conversive somatoform trouble Gupta & Lang ( 2009 ) Edwards & Bahtia 2012 neurological clinical criterion Exclusion criterion : Severe progressive psychiatric disorder Cardiac pacemaker Metallic prosthesis Cochlear implant Previous neurosurgery Epilepsy Severe cardiac disease Alcohol toxic abuse last 12 month Drugs clozapine , bupropion , methadone theophylline
